article: les moonves , president and ceo of cbs television , insisted on tuesday to the nation 's tv press that placing the network 's upcoming sequel to the reality phenomenon `` survivor '' on thursdays opposite nbc 's sitcom juggernaut `` friends '' was not so much an aggressive move as simply a necessary one .
abstract: cbs pits survivor sequel against old friends
candidates: cbs' new reality series will be on thursdays.
